column5: Is there a campground in Vermillion Bay? How about over by Kenora? We are looking for an overnight motor home spot to stop on the way up to Red Lake. Thanks.
Is there a campground in Vermillion Bay? How about over by Kenora? We are looking for an overnight motor home spot to stop on the way up to Red Lake. Thanks.

In Vermillion Bay there is the provincial campground called Blue Lake. There is also Crystal Lake campground. It's just off the trans Canada Hwy. I think they have about 28 RV sites. Near Kenora is Rushing River provincial campground. It's a popular campground and may be tough to get a spot.
